title: Pasta
procedure: Boil water in a large pot and add a pinch of salt.
Add pasta and cook according to package instructions until al dente.
Drain pasta and set aside.
In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add tomato sauce and season with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Add the cooked pasta to the sauce and toss well.
Serve hot with grated cheese and fresh basil.

title: Burger
procedure: Prepare burger patties with minced vegetables or meat, salt, pepper, and spices.
Grill or pan-fry the patties until fully cooked.
Toast burger buns lightly.
Assemble burger: place patty on bun, add cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and condiments.
Top with the other half of the bun and serve immediately.

title: Pizza
procedure: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Add toppings like cheese, vegetables, and pepperoni as desired.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12–15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is melted.
Slice and serve hot.

title: Soup
procedure: Chop vegetables like carrots, potatoes, beans, and celery into small pieces.
In a pot, heat olive oil and sauté onions and garlic until fragrant.
Add the chopped vegetables and cook for 3–5 minutes.
Pour in vegetable stock and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20–25 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Season with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Serve hot with a sprinkle of fresh parsley.

title: Curry
procedure: Chop vegetables such as carrots, bell peppers, potatoes, and peas.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until golden.
Add curry paste or spices and cook for 1–2 minutes.
Add the chopped vegetables and stir well.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20–25 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
Serve hot with rice or bread.

title: Kebab
procedure: Grate or finely chop vegetables like carrots, potatoes, and cabbage.
Mix vegetables with bread crumbs, salt, pepper, and spices to form a dough.
Shape the mixture into small kebabs or patties.
Heat oil in a pan or grill.
Cook kebabs on medium heat until golden brown on both sides.
Serve hot with chutney or sauce.
